required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on May 29, 2018
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: A Phase IIa Study Assessing the Effects of AZD1236 on Biomarkers in Chronic Obstructive Pulmonary Disease (COPD) Patients
clinical_study.official_title: A Double-blind, Randomised, Placebo-controlled, Parallel Group Multi-centre Phase IIa Study to Assess the Effects on Biomarkers in Induced Sputum, Bood and Uine of AZD1236 Administered as Oral Tablet in Moderate to Severe COPD Patients During a 6 Week Period.

brief_summary.textblock: The primary aim of this study is to investigate the effects of AZD1236 compared with placebo ("inactive substance") in COPD patients by analysing biomarkers for inflammation and tissue degradation in blood, urine and sputum.

primary_outcome.measure: Ratio of TNF Alpha at Week 6 to Baseline
primary_outcome.description: Ratio reflects Sputum Tumor Necrosis Factor alpha (TNF alpha) at week 6 value divide by baseline value. Baseline is geometric mean of Visit 2 (last value during run-in) and Visit 3 (Randomization).

primary_outcome.measure: Ratio of Sputum Total Cells at Week 6 to Baseline
primary_outcome.description: Ratio reflects Sputum Total Cells at week 6 value divide by baseline value. Baseline is geometric mean of Visit 2 (last value during run-in) and Visit 3 (Randomization).

primary_outcome.measure: Ratio of Total Urine Desmosine at Week 6 to Baseline
primary_outcome.description: Ratio reflects Total Urine Desmosine at week 6 value divide by baseline value. Baseline is visit 3(Randomization) value.

secondary_outcome.description: Number of patients who had an AE

secondary_outcome.measure: Change From Baseline in Forced Expiratory Volume (FEV1) at Week 6
secondary_outcome.description: Change from baseline reflects the Week 6 value minus the baseline value. Baseline is visit 3(randomization) value.

secondary_outcome.measure: Change From Baseline in Forced Vital Capacity (FVC) at Week 6
secondary_outcome.description: Change from baseline reflects the Week 6 value minus the baseline value. Baseline is visit 3(randomization) value.

secondary_outcome.measure: Change From Baseline in Vital Capacity (VC) at Week 6
secondary_outcome.description: Change from baseline reflects the Week 6 value minus the baseline value. Baseline is visit 3(randomization) value.

secondary_outcome.measure: Change From Baseline in Inspiratory Capacity (IC) at Week 6
secondary_outcome.description: Change from baseline reflects the Week 6 value minus the baseline value. Baseline is visit 3(randomization) value.

secondary_outcome.measure: Change From Baseline in Forced Expiratory Flow (FEF) 25−75% at Week 6
secondary_outcome.description: Change from baseline reflects the Week 6 value minus the baseline value. Baseline is visit 3(randomization) value.

secondary_outcome.measure: Change From Baseline in Peak Expiratory Flow (PEF) Morning at Average of Last 4 Week Treatment
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Baseline and last 4 week on treatment(Week 1, Week 2, Week 4 and Week 6)
secondary_outcome.description: Change from baseline reflects the average of last 4 week on treatment (Week 1, Week 2, Week 4 and Week 6) minus the baseline value. Baseline is the mean of the last 10 days of data during run-in.

secondary_outcome.measure: Change From Baseline in Peak Expiratory Flow (PEF) Evening at Average of Last 4 Week Treatment
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Baseline and last 4 week on treatment(Week 1, Week 2, Week 4 and Week 6)
secondary_outcome.description: Change from baseline reflects the average of last 4 week on treatment (Week 1, Week 2, Week 4 and Week 6) minus the baseline value. Baseline is the mean of the last 10 days of data during run-in.

secondary_outcome.measure: Change From Baseline in Clinical COPD Questionnaire(CCQ) Total
secondary_outcome.description: Change from baseline reflects the Week 6 value minus the baseline value. Baseline is visit 3(randomization) value. The total scores vary between 0 (never/not limited at all) to 6 (almost all the time/totally limited)

secondary_outcome.measure: Change From Baseline in COPD Symptoms, Breathlessness at Average of Last 4 Week Treatment
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Baseline and last 4 week on treatment(Week 1, Week 2, Week 4 and Week 6)
secondary_outcome.description: Change from baseline reflects the average of last 4 week on treatment (Week 1, Week 2, Week 4 and Week 6) minus the baseline value. Baseline is the mean of the last 10 days of data during run-in. Score vary between 0 (None) to 4 (Severe).

secondary_outcome.measure: Change From Baseline in COPD Symptoms, Chest Tightness at Average of Last 4 Week Treatment
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Baseline and last 4 week on treatment(Week 1, Week 2, Week 4 and Week 6)
secondary_outcome.description: Change from baseline reflects the average of last 4 week on treatment (Week 1, Week 2, Week 4 and Week 6) minus the baseline value. Baseline is the mean of the last 10 days of data during run-in. Score vary between 0 (None) to 4 (Severe).

secondary_outcome.measure: Change From Baseline in COPD Symptoms, Cough Score at Average of Last 4 Week Treatment
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Baseline and last 4 week on treatment(Week 1, Week 2, Week 4 and Week 6)
secondary_outcome.description: Change from baseline reflects the average of last 4 week on treatment (Week 1, Week 2, Week 4 and Week 6) minus the baseline value. Baseline is the mean of the last 10 days of data during run-in. Score vary between 0 (None) to 4 (Almost Constant).

secondary_outcome.measure: Change From Baseline in COPD Symptoms, Night Time Awakenings at Average of Last 4 Week Treatment
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Baseline and last 4 week on treatment(Week 1, Week 2, Week 4 and Week 6)
secondary_outcome.description: Change from baseline reflects the average of last 4 week on treatment (Week 1, Week 2, Week 4 and Week 6) minus the baseline value. Baseline is the mean of the last 10 days of data during run-in. Score vary between 0 (None) to 4 (Almost Constant).

arm_group.description: oral tablet, 75 mg, twice daily during 6 weeks

intervention.description: oral tablet, 75 mg, twice daily during 6 weeks

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Diagnosis of COPD for 1 month
- Men or postmenopausal women
- Spirometry values indicating symptomatic patients
- Smoking history equivalent to using 20 cigarettes a day for 10 years.
Exclusion Criteria:
- Any current respiratory tract disorders other than COPD
- Requirement for regular oxygen therapy
- Acute worsening of COPD (exacerbation) 1,5 month prior to study drug administration
- Use of oral or parenteral glucocorticosteroids within 30 days and use of inhaled steroids 14 days prior to the study

outcome.title: Ratio of TNF Alpha at Week 6 to Baseline
outcome.description: Ratio reflects Sputum Tumor Necrosis Factor alpha (TNF alpha) at week 6 value divide by baseline value. Baseline is geometric mean of Visit 2 (last value during run-in) and Visit 3 (Randomization).
outcome.population: Full analysis set excluded participants without baseline or post-baseline data.

event.sub_title: Increased Dyspnoe After Stopping Normal Treatment

certain_agreements.pi_employee: Principal Investigators are NOT employed by the organization sponsoring the study.
certain_agreements.restrictive_agreement: The only disclosure restriction on the PI is that the sponsor can review results communications prior to public release and can embargo communications regarding trial results for a period that is less than or equal to 60 days. The sponsor cannot require changes to the communication and cannot extend the embargo.
